definition: Huaihai, economic hub around Xuzhou 徐州[Xu2 zhou1], including parts of Jiangsu, Shandong, Henan and Anhui provinces
name of a river
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
Huaihai Campaign (Nov 1948-Jan 1949), one of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War, considered the determining battle of the war
Huaihai, economic hub around Xuzhou 徐州[Xu2 zhou1], including parts of Jiangsu, Shandong, Henan and Anhui provinces

sentences.english: Nanjing Road and Huaihai Road are always crowded with people.
sentences.chinese: 南京路和淮海路都挤满了人。

sentences.english: Huaihai road business district of Shanghai Times Square, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 淮海路商圈的大上海时代广场等等。

sentences.english: I'm working at Nanyuan Hotel at 178 Huaihai Road.
sentences.chinese: 我在淮海路178号南园宾馆工作。

sentences.english: The event was prior to the battle of Huaihai.
sentences.chinese: 这件事件在淮海战役之前。

sentences.english: I"m working at Nanyuan Hotel at 178 Huaihai Road."
sentences.chinese: 我在淮海路178号南园宾馆工作。

sentences.english: But you'll have to change for Trolleybus No. 26 at Huaihai Road.
sentences.chinese: 但是你得在淮海路换乘26号无轨电车。

sentences.english: The Huai-Hai Campaign was essential to the victory of the War of Liberation.
sentences.chinese: 淮海战役对解放战争的胜利至关重要。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I went to visit my cousin and looked around her new floor by the way.
sentences.chinese: 淮海路的酒吧，远远的看上去，很美。

sentences.english: Barbie Shanghai is located at 550 Central Huaihai Road.
sentences.chinese: 芭比上海旗舰店位于上海市淮海中路550号。

sentences.english: The Former Site of The Central Committee of The Chinese Communist Youth League is No. 6 Yuyang Road.
sentences.chinese: 上海团中央旧址位于卢湾区淮海中路渔阳里6号。

sentences.english: The bookstore is in Huaihai Road.
The modernization process in Huaihai region is slow though it starts early.
sentences.chinese: 淮海地区现代化起步早，但发展缓慢。

sentences.english: The Huai-Hai Campaign was essential to the victory of the War of    Liberation.
sentences.chinese: 淮海战役对解放战争的胜利至关重要。

sentences.english: His uncle lives at 307 Huaihai Road.
Men and women go in and out flat building on Huaihai Road.
sentences.chinese: 上海出入于淮海路公寓楼里的男女。

sentences.english: Huai Hai Campaign was the last major combat between two Chinese political parties.
sentences.chinese: 淮海战役是国共两党所率军队之间最大的战役。
